title: multimc启动游戏失败
txt_content:
Failed to reconstruct Minecraft assets.
Java Arguments:
[-XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump, -Xms1024m, -Xmx2048m, -Duser.language=en]


Minecraft进程ID：21444


Using onesix launcher.

ERROR StatusLogger Log4j2 could not find a logging implementation. Please add log4j-core to the classpath. Using SimpleLogger to log to the console...
ERROR LaunchWrapper Unable to launch
 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:106)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:98)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.multimc.onesix.OneSixLauncher.launchWithMainClass(OneSixLauncher.java:196)
        at org.multimc.onesix.OneSixLauncher.launch(OneSixLauncher.java:231)
        at org.multimc.EntryPoint.listen(EntryPoint.java:143)
        at org.multimc.EntryPoint.main(EntryPoint.java:34)
进程退出，代码：1。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 尝试重新安装这个游戏版本

xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-29 14:40
尝试重新安装这个游戏版本
不行，启动后还是这样

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
你这都没指定classpath……

尝试手动安装Forge。

具体流程：到http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... e/index_1.12.2.html下载latest版本的installer，下好后双击打开，点三个点的按钮，找到并选中游戏目录.minecraft文件夹，点确认，等待完成

ItIsEnderman 发表于 2020-1-29 15:20
你这都没指定classpath……

尝试手动安装Forge。
你这方法不成功啊，我用的是mutimc的啊

replies.author: 斯蒂尔顿ghk
replies.txt_content: 我也碰到这样的问题，然后再重开又崩溃，得这样好几次才能进去
